phases.admin: Click "Start" when the players are ready.
phases.player: Wait for an admin to click "Start".

phases.admin: Click Terminate to end the market phase

placeHolders.confirm-start-game-description: This is just to confirm you want to start the game, and it's not a misclick.
placeHolders.confirm-end-game-description: By confirming this action you will end the game for all players.
placeHolders.waiting-for-admin-to-start: Wait for an Admin to start the game
placeHolders.public-signal-tooltip: This public valuation is known to everyone
placeHolders.private-signal-tooltip: This valuation is known to you only. Other players may have a private valuation themselves
placeHolders.real-value-tooltip: This is the real value of one share. All the signals are generated starting from it and adding an error
placeHolders.price-tooltip: This is the price agreed on the last contract
placeHolders.reward-message-profit: The real value was ${0}, you own ${1} shares yielding a value of ${0} times ${1}. You have a remaining cash balance of ${2}. Your total value remaining is ${3}. You earned ${4} by trading.
placeHolders.reward-message-loss: The real value was ${0}, you own ${1} shares yielding a value of ${0} times ${1}. You have a remaining cash balance of ${2}. Your total value remaining is ${3}. You lost ${4} by trading.
